# cook your dish here
A, N, K = map(int, input().split())

ans = "" + str(A % (N + 1))
p = A // (N + 1)

for i in range(K - 1):
 ans += " " + str(p % (N + 1))
 p = p // (N + 1)

print(ans)

a,n,k=map(int,input().split())
l=[0 for i in range(k)]

while(j<k):

 a=a//(n+1)
 j+=1
for j in l:
 print(j,end=' ')

a, n, k = map(int, input().split())
arr = [0 for i in range(k)]
i = 0
while a!=0 and i<k:
 arr[i] = a % (n+1)
 a = a // (n+1)
 i += 1
for i in range(k):
 print(arr[i], end=' ')

A, N, K = map(int, input().split())
R = [0]*K
i = 0

while A != 0 and i < K:
 rem = A % (N + 1)
 R[i] = rem
 A //= N + 1 
 i += 1
 
for num in R:
 print(num, end=' ')
print()

# cook your dish here
x,y,z=map(int,input().split())
s=[0]*z 
y=y+1 
for i in range(z):
 s[i]=x%y 
 x=x//y 
print(*s)

a,n,k=list(map(int,input().split()))
l=[]
c=0

 a=a//(n+1)
 c+=1

# cook your dish here
a,n,k = map(int,input().split())

res = [0]*k

for i in range(k):
 res[i] = ((a//((n+1)**i))%(n+1))
 
print(' '.join(str(i) for i in res))
